entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 01:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
